title: From Living In A Shelter To Apocalypse Domination - Novel Updates
tags: Adopted Children   Calm Protagonist   Clan Building   Cute Children   Determined Protagonist   Firearms   Game Elements   Kingdom Building   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Mutated Creatures   Post-apocalyptic   Romantic Subplot   Survival   System Administrator   Transmigration
author: 妖道无涯
description: Two hundred years after mankind’s ultimate nuclear war, civilization no longer exists in the wasteland. There are only barbaric post-chemical laws. Radiation, mutant beasts, living beings, and all kinds of savage creatures have become the biggest features of the wasteland. In an accident, ‘Yu Guo’ was Isekai-ed into a savage apocalyptic world with an eight-year-old daughter beside him. Facing the worst start ever, Yu Guo obtained the ‘Doomsday system’ and opened his own way of surviving in the wasteland!>
